title: DEQ to hold meeting on Heard Farms permit
title_page: DEQ to hold meeting on Heard Farms permit
maintext: The Oregon Department of Environmental Quality will hold an informational meeting about a request from Heard Farms to modify its permit. The meeting will start at 6 p.m. Nov. 8 in Room 310 of the Douglas County Courthouse, 1036 SE Douglas Ave., Roseburg. Information: 541-686-7997.
